content:
Scenario: Workplace care economy recognizes all organizational contributions
    Given organizational success depends on many forms of labor
    And Aisha contributes in multiple ways
    When the workplace_elohim tracks organizational care
    Then it should recognize diverse contributions
    And it should value mentoring, knowledge sharing, and culture building
    And it should make invisible organizational care visible
    And all work supporting collective flourishing should count
    And comprehensive care accounting should inform organizational decisions
    And she should understand the full value she provides
